title: Laura in transition from industry to identity

content.question: Laura is in transition from the psychosocial development stage of industry versus inferiority stage into the identity versus role confusion stage. Which of the following is most likely what Laura is experiencing?

choices.label: She is less affected by self-esteem and more interested in initiative.
She is less interested in accomplishing things and more interested in defining herself.
She is more affected by matters of trust and is not spending much time thinking, “Am I good or bad?”
She is more interested in doing things for herself than relying on others.

content.answer: She is less interested in accomplishing things and more interested in defining herself.

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
